Chatan Yara.label: Chatan Yara
Chatan Yara.description: Chatan Yara, aka Yara Guwa, Ueekata, Yomitan Yara, is credited with being one of the first to disseminate the art of Te throughout Okinawa. Wikipedia

Elena Reid.label: Elena Reid
Elena Reid.description: Elena A. Reid is an American boxer and mixed martial artist. She is a former WIBA and IFBA Flyweight Champion and fights under the nickname Baby Doll. Wikipedia

Emin Boztepe.label: Emin Boztepe
Emin Boztepe.description: Emin Boztepe is an American martial artist of Turkish origin who held German nationality prior to naturalization. Wikipedia

Eric Esch.label: Eric Esch
Eric Esch.description: Eric Scott Esch, commonly referred to as Butterbean, is an American boxer, kickboxer, mixed martial artist and professional wrestler who competes in the heavyweight division. Wikipedia
Eric Esch.Born: August 3, 1966 (age 47), Bay City, Michigan, United States
Movies: Pride FC Pride 32 The Real Deal

Ernesto Hoost.label: Ernesto Hoost
Ernesto Hoost.description: Ernesto Fritz "Mr. Perfect" Hoost is a Dutch former kickboxing legend and four-time K-1 World Champion. He made his debut in 1993 at the K-1 World Grand Prix 1993, where he came just one win short of the world title. Wikipedia

Eyal Yanilov.label: Eyal Yanilov
Eyal Yanilov.description: Eyal Yanilov is an Israeli Krav Maga instructor and currently Chief Instructor of Krav Maga Global. He was a co-founder and Chief Instructor of the International Krav Maga Federation from 1996 to 2010. Wikipedia

Hideo Ochi.label: Hideo Ochi
Hideo Ochi.description: Hideo Ochi is a Japanese master of karate. He is ranked 8th Dan, and is a former Japan Karate Association World Champion in kumite and kata. He was also coach of the German national team and Chief Instructor for JKA Europe. Wikipedia

Hironori Ōtsuka.label: Hironori Ōtsuka
Hironori Ōtsuka.description: Hironori Ōtsuka was a Japanese master of karate who created the Wadō-ryū style of karate. He was the first Grand Master of Wadō-ryū karate, and received high awards within Japan for his contributions to karate. Wikipedia

Ichiro Abe.label: Ichiro Abe
Ichiro Abe.description: Ichiro Abe is a Japanese judoka. He is head of the Promotions Panel at the Kodokan and former international chairperson of the All Nippon Judo Federation. Wikipedia

Kanei Uechi.label: Kanei Uechi
Kanei Uechi.description: Kanei Uechi was the son of Kanbun Uechi, founder of Uechi-ryū, one of the primary karate styles of Okinawa. Kanei was instrumental in the growth of Uechi after his father's death. Wikipedia

Keigo Abe.label: Keigo Abe
Keigo Abe.description: Keigo Abe is a prominent Japanese master of Shotokan karate who founded the Japan Shotokan Karate Association in 1999 and is its Chief Instructor. Wikipedia

Keith R. Kernspecht.label: Keith R. Kernspecht
Keith R. Kernspecht.description: Keith Ronald Graf von Rothenburg Kernspecht, better known as Keith R. Kernspecht, is a German martial artist and entrepreneur. Wikipedia

Leung Ting.label: Leung Ting
Leung Ting.description:
Leung Ting is the founder and permanent president of the International WingTsun Association.
Leung chose the spelling of Wing Tsun to differentiate his teachings from those of other Wing Chun schools, ... Wikipedia

Mas Oyama.label: Mas Oyama
Mas Oyama.description: Masutatsu Oyama, more commonly known as Mas Oyama, was a karate master who founded Kyokushin Karate, considered the first and most influential style of full contact karate. He was born Choi Yeong-eui. Wikipedia

Masaaki Hatsumi.label: Masaaki Hatsumi
Masaaki Hatsumi.description: Masaaki Hatsumi, formerly Yoshiaki Hatsumi, is the founder of the Bujinkan Organization and claims to be the current Togakure-ryū Soke. He currently resides and teaches in Noda, Chiba, Japan. Wikipedia

Masatoshi Nakayama.label: Masatoshi Nakayama
Masatoshi Nakayama.description: Masatoshi Nakayama was an internationally renowned Japanese master of Shotokan karate. He helped establish the Japan Karate Association in 1949, and wrote many textbooks on karate, which served to popularize his martial art. Wikipedia

Matsumura Sōkon.label: Sōkon Matsumura
Matsumura Sōkon.description: Matsumura Sōkon was one of the original karate masters of Okinawa. His life is reported variously as or or or Wikipedia

Motobu Chōki.label: Motobu Chōki
Motobu Chōki.description: Motobu Chōki was a Japanese karateka from Akahira Village in Shuri, Okinawa, capital of the Ryūkyū Kingdom when he was born. His elder brother Motobu Chōyū was also a noted karateka. Wikipedia

Peichin Takahara.label: Peichin Takahara
Peichin Takahara.description: Takahara Pēchin was an early karate practitioner. He was known as a great warrior and is attributed to have been the first to explain the aspects or principles of the dō. Pēchin was a social class of the Ryūkyū Kingdom. Wikipedia

Sean Patrick Flanery.label: Sean Patrick Flanery
Sean Patrick Flanery.description: Sean Patrick Flanery is an American actor, known for playing Connor MacManus in The Boondock Saints, Greg Stillson in The Dead Zone, Jeremy "Powder" Reed in Powder, Indiana Jones in The Young Indiana ... Wikipedia
Sean Patrick Flanery.Born: October 11, 1965 (age 48), Lake Charles, Louisiana, United States

Shōshin Nagamine.label: Shōshin Nagamine
Shōshin Nagamine.description: Shōshin Nagamine was a Japanese author from Okinawa as well as a soldier, police officer, and karate master. Wikipedia

Sven Ottke.label: Sven Ottke
Sven Ottke.description: Sven Ottke, known as "The Phantom", is a German former professional boxer who was the IBF/WBA super middleweight champion. Ottke was the third European boxer to retire as an undefeated world champion, after Terry Marsh and Romanian Michael Loewe. Wikipedia

Taiji Kase.label: Taiji Kase
Taiji Kase.description: Taiji Kase was a Japanese master of Shotokan karate who was one of the earliest masters responsible for introducing this martial art into Europe. He taught his style of karate, Shotokan Ryu Kase Ha, in France from the late 1960s to the mid-1980s. Wikipedia

Tetsuhiko Asai.label: Tetsuhiko Asai
Tetsuhiko Asai.description: Tetsuhiko Asai was a prominent Japanese master of Shotokan karate who was a former Technical Director of the Japan Karate Association, founder and Chief Instructor of the International Japan Martial ... Wikipedia

Tito Ortiz.label: Tito Ortiz
Tito Ortiz.description: Jacob Christopher "Tito" Ortiz is an American mixed martial artist and occasional professional wrestling personality fighting for Bellator MMA with infrequent appearances for Total Nonstop Action Wrestling. Wikipedia
Tito Ortiz.Born: January 23, 1975 (age 39), Huntington Beach, California, United States

Gichin Funakoshi.label: Gichin Funakoshi
Gichin Funakoshi.description: Gichin Funakoshi is the founder of Shotokan Karate-Do, perhaps the most widely known style of karate, and is attributed as being the "father of modern karate". Wikipedia

Gozo Shioda.label: Gōzō Shioda
Gozo Shioda.description: Gozo Shioda was a Japanese master of aikido who founded the Yoshinkan style of aikido. He was one of aikido founder Morihei Ueshiba's most senior students. Shioda held the rank of 10th dan in aikido. Wikipedia

Jean-Claude Van Damme.label: Jean-Claude Van Damme
Jean-Claude Van Damme.description: Jean-Claude Camille François Van Varenberg, professionally known as Jean-Claude Van Damme and abbreviated as JCVD, is a Belgian martial artist, actor, and director best known for his martial arts action films. Wikipedia

Kanō Jigorō.label: Jigoro Kano
Kanō Jigorō.description: Kanō Jigorō was the founder of judo. Judo was the first Japanese martial art to gain widespread international recognition, and the first to become an official Olympic sport. Wikipedia
Books: Mind Over Muscle Writings from the Founder of Judo

Koichi Tohei.label: Koichi Tohei
Koichi Tohei.description: Koichi Tohei was a 10th Dan aikidoka and founder of the Ki Society and its style of aikido, officially Shin Shin Toitsu Aikido, but commonly known as Ki-Aikido. Wikipedia

Morihei Ueshiba.label: Morihei Ueshiba
Morihei Ueshiba.description: Morihei Ueshiba was a famous martial artist and founder of the Japanese martial art of aikido. He is often referred to as "the founder" Kaiso or Ōsensei, "Great Teacher". Wikipedia

Takeda Sōkaku.label: Sokaku Takeda
Takeda Sōkaku.description: Takeda Sōkaku was known as the founder of a school of jujutsu known as Daitō-ryū Aiki-jūjutsu. Wikipedia

Bob Gilstrap.label: Bob Gilstrap
Bob Gilstrap.description: Robert "Bob" Gilstrap is an American former mixed martial artist who competed in the Heavyweight division. He lost the last fight of his career at AMC - Return of the Gladiators 1 against Jeff Monson on July 29, 2000. Wikipedia

Bristol Marunde.label: Bristol Marunde
Bristol Marunde.description: Bristol Marunde is an American mixed martial artist currently competing in the Welterweight division. Wikipedia

David Avellan.label: David Avellan
David Avellan.description: David Avellan is an American grappler and professional mixed martial artist who has fought for World Extreme Cagefighting and Bodog Fight promotions. Past opponents include French journeyman Antony Rea and UFC contender Aaron Simpson. Wikipedia

Erhan Deniz.label: Erhan Deniz
Erhan Deniz.description: Erhan "Pitbull Attack" Deniz is a Turkish heavyweight kickboxer, who fights out of Mejiro Gym and Global Gym. His nickname comes from his passion on pit bull dogs. Wikipedia

Felicia Oh.label: Felicia Oh
Felicia Oh.description: Felicia Linda Oh is an Asian American black belt in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu under senior instructor Jean Jacques Machado, an accomplished submission grappling competitor, martial arts instructor, and college professor. Wikipedia

Gülderen Çelik.label: Gülderen Çelik
Gülderen Çelik.description: Gülderen Çelik is a Turkish female karateka competing in the kumite –53 kg division. The 1.80 m tall athlete is member of the Sarıyer Belediyespor in Istanbul. Her trainer is Turan Yılmaz. Wikipedia

Gary Daniels.label: Gary Daniels
Gary Daniels.description: Gary Edward Daniels is a British actor and retired kickboxer who scored 34 knockout victories, and a former World Light-heavyweight Kickboxing Champion; known for appearing in action-oriented martial arts B-films. Wikipedia

Gerard Gordeau.label: Gerard Gordeau
Gerard Gordeau.description: Gerard Gordeau is a retired Dutch savateur, karateka, and mixed martial artist. He is the 1991 World Champion Savate and holder of the Dutch Champion Kyokushin Karate title for 8 consecutive years, but ... Wikipedia
Movies: UFC Classics Ultimate Fighting Championship Vol. 1

Hesdy Gerges.label: Hesdy Gerges
Hesdy Gerges.description: Hesdy Gerges is an Egyptian-Dutch kickboxer, fighting out of the Vos Gym in Amsterdam, Netherlands. He held the It's Showtime World Heavyweight title until January 28, 2012. Wikipedia

James Thompson (fighter).label: James Thompson
James Thompson (fighter).description: James Thompson is an English professional mixed martial artist. He fights as a Heavyweight and has also fought at Super Heavyweight. Over his career he has competed in Pride FC, Cage Rage, EliteXC, Sengoku, Dream, KSW, and the SFL. Wikipedia
Movies: Elite XC Street Certified Kimbo vs. TankMore

Josh Barnett.label: Josh Barnett
Josh Barnett.description: Joshua Lawrence Barnett is an American mixed martial artist and professional wrestler who competes in the Heavyweight division of the UFC where he is a former UFC Heavyweight Champion. Wikipedia
Movies: Pride FC Pride 32 The Real Deal

Luke Cummo.label: Luke Cummo
Luke Cummo.description: Luke Joseph Cummo is a former mixed martial artist who appeared in the second season of the reality TV series The Ultimate Fighter on Spike TV. Wikipedia
Luke Cummo.Born: April 27, 1980 (age 33), New Hyde Park, New York, United States

Shane Carwin.label: Shane Carwin
Shane Carwin.description: Shane Bannister Carwin is a retired American mixed martial artist who competed in the Heavyweight division of the Ultimate Fighting Championship, where he was the former UFC Interim Heavyweight Champion. Wikipedia
Movies: UFC Ultimate Fighting Championship Ultimate Knockouts 7More

Yuri Maier.label: Yuri Maier
Yuri Maier.description: Yuri Maier is an Argentine Olympic wrestler, who has won multiple international titles representing his country and individually. Wikipedia

Adam Watt.label: Adam Watt
Adam Watt.description: Adam Keith Watt is an Australian former boxer and kickboxer. He has studied kickboxing, Seido-kaikan karate, and boxing. Wikipedia

Alex Gong.label: Alex Gong
Alex Gong.description: Alexander "F-14" James Gong was an American Muay Thai kickboxer. Wikipedia
Alex Gong.Born: October 14, 1970, San Francisco, California, United States
Alex Gong.Died: August 1, 2003, San Francisco, California, United States

Alexander Ustinov.label: Alexander Ustinov
Alexander Ustinov.description: Alexander "The Great" Ustinov is a Belarussian super heavyweight kickboxer, boxer and mixed martial artist. Wikipedia

Alexander Volkov (fighter).label: Alexander Volkov
Alexander Volkov (fighter).description: Alexander Yevgenievich Volkov is a Russian mixed martial artist who competes in the heavyweight division. A professional MMA competitor since 2009, Volkov has competed almost exclusively for the M-1 Global promotion. Wikipedia

Alistair Overeem.label: Alistair Overeem
Alistair Overeem.description: Alistair Cees Overeem is a Dutch-English mixed martial artist and kickboxer signed with the Ultimate Fighting Championship. Wikipedia

Assuerio Silva.label: Assuerio Silva
Assuerio Silva.description: Assuerio Silva is a Brazilian mixed martial artist and professional boxer, having most recently competed in the Ultimate Fighting Championship and Pancrase. He became the Heavyweight King of Pancrase on May 30, 2007, defeating Tatsuya Mizuno. Wikipedia
Assuerio Silva.Born: June 18, 1974 (age 39), Mossoró, Rio Grande do Norte, Brazil

Bas Rutten.label: Bas Rutten
Bas Rutten.description: Sebastiaan "Bas" Rutten is a Dutch retired mixed martial artist, Karate and Taekwondo blackbelt, and Muay Thai kickboxer. Wikipedia

Ben Askren.label: Ben Askren
Ben Askren.description: Ben Askren is an American former amateur wrestler for the University of Missouri and U.S. Olympic team. He is now a grappler, mixed martial artist and the former Bellator Welterweight Champion known for his effective wrestling. Wikipedia

Boris Georgiev.label: Boris Georgiev
Boris Georgiev.description: Boris Georgiev is an amateur boxer from Bulgaria who won a bronze medal at the 2004 Summer Olympics in the Light Welterweight class. Wikipedia

Chen Fake.label: Chen Fake
Chen Fake.description: Chen Fake or Ch'en Fa-k'e was a Chinese taijiquan teacher. Born and raised in Chen Family Village in Henan province, he was the 17th generation lineage holder of Chen-style taijiquan. Wikipedia

Chris Leben.label: Chris Leben
Chris Leben.description: Christian Cyrus Leben is a retired American mixed martial artist who fought for the UFC as a Middleweight, compiling a record of 12-10 in 22 appearances for the organization. Wikipedia
Movies and TV shows: UFC The Ultimate 100 Greatest Fights Vol. 4

Cole Konrad.label: Cole Konrad
Cole Konrad.description: Cole Konrad is a retired American mixed martial arts fighter. He is currently a student at the University of Minnesota and former wrestler for the Golden Gophers. Konrad won a gold medal at the 2005 Pan-American Championships. Wikipedia

Count Dante.label: Count Dante
Count Dante.description: Count Juan Raphael Dante was a controversial American martial artist figure during the 1960s and 1970s who claimed he could do extraordinary feats such as Dim Mak. Wikipedia

Cristiane Santos.label: Cristiane Justino
Cristiane Santos.description: Cristiane Justino Venancio is a Brazilian mixed martial artist and the former Strikeforce Women's Featherweight Champion and the current Invicta FC World Featherweight Champion . Wikipedia
Movies: Elite XC Lawler vs Smith II

Dan Hardy.label: Dan Hardy
Dan Hardy.description: Daniel Mark Hardy is an English mixed martial artist who has fought in the welterweight division. A professional MMA competitor since 2004, Hardy fought in various promotions such as Cage Force and Cage ... Wikipedia

Dan Severn.label: Dan Severn
Dan Severn.description: Daniel "Dan" DeWayne Severn is a retired American mixed martial artist and professional wrestler, notable for his success in the early years of Ultimate Fighting Championship tournaments. Wikipedia
Movies and TV shows: UFC Classics Ultimate Fighting Championship Vol. 9
World Extreme Fighting Vol. 2 The Greatest
UFC Classics Ultimate Fighting Championship Vol. 4
UFC Classics Ultimate Fighting Championship Vol. 12
UFC Classics Ultimate Fighting Championship Vol. 5
UFC Classics Ultimate Fighting Championship Vol. 6
Behind the Octagon with Dan SevernMore

Daniel Cormier.label: Daniel Cormier
Daniel Cormier.description: Daniel Cormier is an American mixed martial artist and former Olympic wrestler. He is signed to the Ultimate Fighting Championship, currently competing in the light heavyweight division. Cormier was the Strikeforce Heavyweight Grand Prix Champion. Wikipedia

David Tua.label: David Tua
David Tua.description: David Tua is a former professional heavyweight boxer, who fought out of South Auckland, New Zealand. Tua is a former world heavyweight title challenger and is known for his punching power. Wikipedia

Dokonjonosuke Mishima.label: Dokonjonosuke Mishima
Dokonjonosuke Mishima.description: Yoshitomi Mishima known as Dokonjonosuke Mishima, also written Dokonjyonosuke Mishima, is a Japanese mixed martial artist and Pro Wrestler. Wikipedia

Ed Parker.label: Ed Parker
Ed Parker.description: Edmund Kealoha "Ed" Parker was an American martial artist, promoter, teacher, and author. Wikipedia

Emmanuel Yarborough.label: Emmanuel Yarborough
Emmanuel Yarborough.description: Emmanuel 'Manny' Yarbrough is an American amateur sumo wrestler and mixed martial arts competitor, also having competed in judo, wrestling, and American football. He is 6 ft 8 in tall and has weighed up to 800+ lb. Wikipedia
Emmanuel Yarborough.Born: September 5, 1964 (age 49), Rahway, New Jersey, United States

Eric Pele.label: Eric Pele
Eric Pele.description: Eric Pele is a retired American mixed martial artist and former King of the Cage Super Heavyweight Champion. Wikipedia
Eric Pele.Born: October 21, 1969 (age 44), Las Vegas, Nevada, United States

Antônio Rodrigo Nogueira.label: Antônio Rodrigo Nogueira
Antônio Rodrigo Nogueira.description: Antônio Rodrigo Nogueira, better known as Minotauro or Minotauro Nogueira, is a Brazilian mixed martial artist known for his technical mastery of Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu. Wikipedia
Antônio Rodrigo Nogueira.Born: June 2, 1976 (age 37), Vitória da Conquista, Bahia, Brazil

Alexey Ignashov.label: Alexey Ignashov
Alexey Ignashov.description: Alexey Victoravich Ignashov is a Belarusian Super Heavyweight kickboxer. He is a four-time Muay Thai World champion, K-1 World GP 2003 in Paris and K-1 World GP 2001 in Nagoya tournament champion. Wikipedia

Frank Dux.label: Frank Dux
Frank Dux.description: Frank W. Dux is a martial artist and fight choreographer. Dux established his own school of Ninjutsu in 1975, called "Dux Ryu Ninjutsu". Wikipedia
Books: The Secret Man An American Warrior's Uncensored Story

Frank Mir.label: Frank Mir
Frank Mir.description: Francisco Santos Mir, III, better known as Frank Mir, is an American mixed martial artist. Mir is a former UFC Heavyweight Champion and a former Interim UFC Heavyweight Champion. Wikipedia
Frank Mir.Born: May 24, 1979 (age 34), Las Vegas, Nevada, United States

Gago Drago.label: Gago Drago
Gago Drago.description: Gagik Harutyunyan, better known as Gago Drago, is an Armenian-Dutch welterweight kickboxer, fighting out of Alkmaar, Netherlands. He is known for his punch combinations and unpredictable kicking techniques and highly aggressive fighting style. Wikipedia

Genki Sudo.label: Genki Sudo
Genki Sudo.description: Genki Sudo is Japanese singer, composer, choreographer, actor and author. He is the lead vocal, producer and director of the music group World Order, which is known for their techno music style and highly synchronised robotic choreography. Wikipedia

Gina Carano.label: Gina Carano
Gina Carano.description: Gina Joy Carano is an American actress, television personality, fitness model, and former mixed martial artist. Wikipedia
Gina Carano.Born: April 16, 1982 (age 31), Dallas County, Texas, United States

Hector Lombard.label: Hector Lombard
Hector Lombard.description: Hector Lombard is a Cuban-Australian professional mixed martial artist and former Olympic judoka who competes as a welterweight in the Ultimate Fighting Championship. As of March 17, 2014, he is #6 in official UFC welterweight rankings. Wikipedia

Hiromitsu Miura.label: Hiromitsu Miura
Hiromitsu Miura.description: Hiromitsu Miura is a Japanese Boxer and former mixed martial artist who competed in the welterweight division in MMA and now competes in the light heavyweight division in boxing. Wikipedia

Howard Jackson (boxer).label: Howard Jackson
Howard Jackson (boxer).description: Howard E. Jackson was a former World Kickboxing Champion, a World Muay Thai Champion, a world rated Karate point fighter, and a world rated boxing contender. Wikipedia

Ian Loveland.label: Ian Loveland
Ian Loveland.description: Ian Loveland is an American professional mixed martial arts fighter. Loveland has fought for promotions such as King of the Cage, International Fight League, and the Ultimate Fighting Championship. Wikipedia

Hwang Kee.label: Hwang Kee
Hwang Kee.description: Hwang Kee was one of the most important figures in the Korean martial art of Tang Soo Do. He was the founder of Soo Bahk Do and the school of Tang Soo Do Moo Duk Kwan. Wikipedia

Igor Vovchanchyn.label: Igor Vovchanchyn
Igor Vovchanchyn.description: Igor Yaroslavovych "Ice Cold" Vovchanchyn is a retired Ukrainian mixed martial artist and kickboxer. He won seven mixed martial arts tournaments, held a 37 fight unbeaten streak, and reached the final of the Pride Grand Prix 2000. Wikipedia
Movies: Pride FC Beasts from the East 2

Jacob McClintock.label: Jacob McClintock
Jacob McClintock.description: Jacob Patrick McClintock is an American mixed martial artist. McClintock is a welterweight fighter and has a record of 8-2, all seven win have been stopped in round one. He is most known for his stint with Bellator Fighting Championships. Wikipedia

Jared Rosholt.label: Jared Rosholt
Jared Rosholt.description: Jared Rosholt is an American mixed martial artist and former collegiate amateur wrestler who competes as a heavyweight in the Ultimate Fighting Championship. He is the younger brother of former UFC fighter Jake Rosholt. Wikipedia

Jay Silva.label: Jay Silva
Jay Silva.description: Jay Silva is a Brazilian-Angolan mixed martial artist, who has competed for the UFC, Bellator, Tachi Palace Fights and more recently KSW. He currently competes in the Middleweight division. Wikipedia

Joe Slick.label: Joe Slick
Joe Slick.description: Joe Slick is a retired American mixed martial arts fighter. He competed in the Light Heavyweight division. He lost his last fight at Rings Australia - Free Fight Battle against Chris Haseman on November 12, 2000. Wikipedia
Joe Slick.Born: October 17, 1977 (age 36), Iowa City, Iowa, United States

John Hathaway.label: John Hathaway
John Hathaway.description: John Lawrence Hathaway is an English mixed martial artist who competes in the welterweight division. He holds notable victories over Rick Story, Paul Taylor and Diego Sanchez. Wikipedia

John Lewis (fighter).label: John Lewis
John Lewis (fighter).description: John Lewis on the island of Oahu in Hawaii, is an American former mixed martial arts champion, UFC veteran, and a popular MMA/martial arts instructor considered a legend throughout the mixed martial arts world. Wikipedia

Kazushi Sakuraba.label: Kazushi Sakuraba
Kazushi Sakuraba.description: Kazushi Sakuraba is a Japanese professional mixed martial artist and professional wrestler, currently signed to New Japan Pro Wrestling. He has competed in pro-wrestling for New Japan Pro Wrestling, UWFi and Kingdom Pro Wrestling. Wikipedia
Movies: Pride FC The Return of the WarriorsMore

Keith Jardine.label: Keith Jardine
Keith Jardine.description: Keith Hector Jardine is an American mixed martial artist, competing as a middleweight. He is perhaps best known for his time as a light heavyweight with the UFC, and also competed for Strikeforce, Shark ... Wikipedia

Kentsū Yabu.label: Kentsū Yabu
Kentsū Yabu.description: Kentsū Yabu was a prominent teacher of Shōrin-ryū karate in Okinawa from the 1910s until the 1930s, and was among the first people to demonstrate karate in Hawaii. Wikipedia

Khabib Nurmagomedov.label: Khabib Nurmagomedov
Khabib Nurmagomedov.description: Khabib Abdulmanapovich Nurmagomedov is a Avar Dagestani-born Russian undefeated mixed martial artist, a multiple Combat Sambo World Champion and a Judo black belt who is currently fighting in the ... Wikipedia

Kimbo Slice.label: Kimbo Slice
Kimbo Slice.description: Kevin Ferguson, better known as Kimbo Slice, is a Bahamian born American boxer, mixed martial artist and occasional actor. Wikipedia

Kimo Leopoldo.label: Kimo Leopoldo
Kimo Leopoldo.description: Kimo Leopoldo, or simply Kimo, is a retired American mixed martial artist. He made his MMA debut at UFC 3 in 1994 losing to Royce Gracie by submission. Wikipedia
Movies: Kimo Presents Valor Fighting 2 Kimo's Konquerors

Kiyoshi Tamura.label: Kiyoshi Tamura
Kiyoshi Tamura.description:
Kiyoshi Tamura is a Japanese middleweight professional wrestler and mixed martial artist.
Once a student of legendary pro wrestlers Billy Robinson, Nobuhiko Takada and Akira Maeda, Tamura is known for ... Wikipedia

Kozo Takeda.label: Kozo Takeda
Kozo Takeda.description: Kozo Takeda is a Japanese former welterweight kickboxer who was competing in K-1 MAX. He won Rajadamnern Stadium champion at welterweight in Muay Thai on January 21, 2001. Wikipedia
